Event.name: Lose_possession_scenario
Event.definition: <def-root>This is the Frame which binds together the initial state of the <fen>Donor</fen> possessing the <fen>Theme</fen>, the transfer, and the final state of the <fen>Donor</fen> not possessing the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Donor
Arg.definition: <def-root>The entity that began by owning the Theme.</def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition: <def-root>The thing which was originally owned by the <fen>Donor</fen>. (This does not include bodyparts or medical conditions, but does include intellectual property, etc.)</def-root>
